Table of Contents

Name

nemo2gadget - Convert NEMO snapshot to GADGET snapshot

Synopsis

nemo2gadget [parameter=value]

Description

No description available. This manual page was created by mkman

This program is currently to be preferred over snapgadget(1NEMO) , but has been deprecated by the more powerful uns2uns(1NEMO) .

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
NEMO input [???]
out=
GADGET output [???]
ng=
#gas particles [0]
nh=
#halo particles [0]
nd=
#disk particles [0]
nb=
#bulge particles [0]
ns=
#stars particles [0]
files=
#output gadget files [1]
swap=
#swap data from/to little/big endian. [f]

Examples

See Also

gadget2nemo(1NEMO) ,snapgadget(1NEMO) , uns2uns(1NEMO)

Files

src/nbody/io/gadget

Author

Jean-Charles Lambert
